original: Tips and Tricks
translated: 长期经营小贴士

original: Make no bones about it!
translated: 对推拿不要有任何怀疑！

original: A sure-fire way to run your business into the ground is to assume that chiropractic treatments are only useful for lower back pain. Remember: all health problems from acne to anorexia, from constipation to cardiovascular congestion, from delinquency to diabetes can be cured by a quick fumble along the spine.
translated: 如果你觉得推拿只能治疗下背部疼痛，那你开的推拿店绝对无法成功。记住：无论是痤疮还是厌食症，无论是便秘还是心肌梗塞，无论是犯罪还是糖尿病，一切健康问题都可以通过对脊椎的按压解决。

original: Don't know how it works but it does!
translated: 虽然不明白说的是什么，但真的很厉害！

original: We find that the use of meaningless but impressive-sounding terms helps to build credibility. Remember, 'Vertebral Subluxation' is the all-encompassing excuse for the myriad of signs and symptoms that we attribute to a misaligned spinal segment. Just like when you're trying to bag a chick, keep it vague but complicated. It would be catastrophic if it got out that our treatments are no more effective than a back rub. If someone questions subluxation, use the pinched garden hose analogy. Then brain them and dump them out back.
translated: 我们发现，毫无意义但听起来很牛逼的术语能够提高可信度。记住，一切症状最终都可以归结于「脊柱关节半脱位」，也就是说有几块脊椎骨错位了。就跟泡妞一样，必须要装出一副高深莫测的样子。要是被人发现推拿的疗效跟普通按摩差不多，我们就完蛋了。有人问起「半脱位」是什么的话，就拿打结的浇水管举例子。之后找机会敲死他，抛尸野外。

original: Offer free examinations in shopping malls.
translated: 在商场里提供免费体检。

original: Don't forget the plastic skeleton! Great way to meet brainless girls!
translated: 一定要带上骨骼模型！能让无脑姑娘上钩的利器。

original: Lock patients into a cycle
translated: 让患者定期接受治疗

original: Lock patients into a cycle of regular but unnecessary treatment to ensure that they spend their twilight years wall-mounted on a wooden pallet, drinking their dinner through a straw.
translated: 让患者定期接受没有必要的治疗，确保他们的老年生活在床上度过，只能用吸管进食。

original: The 'Animal Cracker'
translated: 「动物推拿」可以有

original: Why not throw it out to pets as well?! Dogs love a good back pop and will sometimes get erect.
translated: 何不在宠物身上试试？！狗狗也很喜欢背部的清脆响声，有时还会勃起。

original: Keep it flowing.
translated: 保持气血流动。

original: Consider colonic irrigations as part of the process. Insist on them daily.
translated: 把灌肠也作为治疗的一部分。推荐患者每日一灌。

original: Above and beyond the call of duty.
translated: 远超业务范围的服务。

original: Don't be afraid to drop a hint that "extra" services are on the menu... You've got to compete with those slutty masseurs!
translated: 不要羞涩，提示患者目录上还有「附加服务」... 你要和那帮男按摩师竞争客户！

original: Hurt children so they'll never wet the bed again!
translated: 伤害儿童，他们就永远都不会尿床了！

original: Aggressively promote the untold benefits of kneading a baby's spinal cord. Remember the three magic words: Lifetime Maintenance Care... make sure that they are flopping around the house like a seal by the time they reach puberty.
translated: 大吹特吹揉捏婴儿脊柱的好处。记住这个神奇的词语：终生维护保养... 让他们在青春期前都只能像海豹一样在家里打滚。

original: YOU CAN NEVER HAVE TOO MANY X-RAYS!
translated: X光片永远不嫌多！

original: Well, you can, and they sometimes give you fatal diseases, but oh well, life goes on, even without you.
translated: 好吧，偶尔也会嫌多的，说不定还会拍出癌症。不过没事的，没你地球一样转。

original: Straighten it out.
translated: 直言不讳。

original: Tell girls that their breasts are uneven and in need of alignment...
translated: 告诉姑娘她的胸部发育不均衡，需要对称治疗...

original: Try the same approach with other body parts.
translated: 这一套也可以用于身体的其他部位。

original: Use the AMP Method.
translated: 用好AMP触诊法。

original: Advanced Muscle Palpation is an excellent excuse for feeling up a girl's tits.
translated: 进阶肌肉触诊是摸胸的最好理由。

original: Always emphasize that you are a Primary Care Provider.
translated: 多次强调你是初级保健提供者。

original: Sell strange-shaped pillows in the reception area.
translated: 在接待区出售奇形怪状的枕头。

original: Offer as many ridiculous treatments as possible
translated: 提供各种奇怪的项目，越多越好

original: Stay one step ahead of the competition! Iridology, Applied Kinesiology, Fisting, Pendulum Divining, Hair Analysis, Labia Piercing, Herbal Crystallization Analysis, Aquarian Age Healing, Bioenergetics, Somatosynthesis are just a few great ways to scam the patient into parting with their life savings.
translated: 永远领先对手一步！虹膜学、人体运动学、拳打疗法、灵摆疗法、毛发分析、阴唇穿环、草药结晶分析、水瓶座时代疗法、生物能量学、躯体综合疗法，这些都是欺骗患者积蓄的好方法。

original: Orthopedists, physiotherapists and osteopaths are evil shysters.
translated: 骨科医生、理疗师、正骨医生都是卑鄙小人。

original: Take a few acting classes.
translated: 学一点表演课。

original: Within 24 hours you will be fully indoctrinated into the cult of chiropractics. Deprogramming will take years. Sponsored by the Epsilon Program.
translated: 短短24小时就能领悟推拿之道。相关思想需要多年才能消除。由埃普西隆计划赞助。
